references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is a crucial component for many image generation and editing methods, demonstrating its wide-ranging impact.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of diffusion models, offering valuable insights into their design and functionality.
DDIM, introduced in this paper, is an important sampling method used in various diffusion models, showing its practical relevance.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces SDXL, a state-of-the-art diffusion model used extensively in the experiments, highlighting its importance in recent advancements.
